about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a Master’s student in Artificial Intelligence, passionate about solving real-world problems using machine learning, computer vision, and multi-agent systems. I enjoy working on challenging projects and continuously learning new technologies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.socialText: Feel free to reach out via email or connect with me on social media.
contact.alertMessage: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.

hero.title: Master's Student in AI
hero.description: Passionate about Machine Learning, Computer Vision, and Multi-Agent Systems.

projects.title: NIH Chest X-rays Image Classification
projects.description: Built a CNN for classifying NIH chest X-ray images using Python, TensorFlow, and OpenCV.
projects.details: This project involved preprocessing a large dataset of chest X-ray images and training a convolutional neural network (CNN) to classify them into different categories.

projects.title: Handball Match Spatial Interactions
projects.description: Analyzed spatial interactions in handball matches using Python, SciPy, and Matplotlib.
projects.details: This project focused on analyzing player movements and interactions during handball matches to identify patterns and strategies.

projects.title: Multi-Agent Production Workshop System
projects.description: Developed a multi-agent system for production workshop management using Java and JADE.
projects.details: This project involved designing and implementing a multi-agent system to optimize production workflows in a workshop environment.

projects.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
projects.description: Created a chatbot using natural language processing and machine learning techniques.
projects.details: This project involved training a chatbot to understand and respond to user queries using NLP and machine learning models.

projects.title: Image Recognition System
projects.description: Developed an image recognition system using convolutional neural networks.
projects.details: This project involved building and training a CNN to recognize objects in images with high accuracy.
